alternative_title: Amending birth, marriage or death records
body:
$!
Contact the register office or religious building where the event was registered to correct errors on a certificate or record.
$!

You can [search for a register office](/register-offices "Register offices") by postcode or location.

##Information on certificates and records

Certificates show the information held on the official record of a birth, marriage or death.

%A certificate or record can only be changed when the information on it is wrong. %

Changes can't be made to show new information if your circumstances have changed after the event. For example, if you have changed your name after your child was born. 

When a mistake is corrected, the original information will always be shown on the record but a note will be added saying why the change was made.

##Application forms and guidance

You may be told by your local register office that you need to contact the General Register Office (GRO) to correct the mistake. 

Read the following guidance notes and complete the appropriate form to request changes to a certificate or record.

$D
[Download 'Guidance on how to correct details on a birth registration' (PDF, 45KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/documents/digitalasset/dg_200732.pdf "Guidance on how to correct details on a birth registration (PDF, 45KB)"){:rel="external"}
[Download 'Application form to correct details on a birth registration' (PDF, 25KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/documents/digitalasset/dg_200729.pdf "Application form to correct details on a birth registration (PDF, 25KB)"){:rel="external"}
$D

$D
[Download 'Guidance on how to remove incorrect father's details from a birth registration' (PDF, 46KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/documents/digitalasset/dg_200734.pdf "Guidance on how to remove incorrect father's details from a birth registration (PDF, 46KB)"){:rel="external"}
[Download 'Application form to remove incorrect father's details from a birth registration' (PDF, 24KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/documents/digitalasset/dg_200731.pdf "Application form to remove incorrect father's details from a birth registration (PDF, 24KB)"){:rel="external"}
$D

$D
[Download 'Guidance on how to correct details on a marriage registration' (PDF, 43KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/documents/digitalasset/dg_200735.pdf "Guidance on how to correct details on a marriage registration (PDF, 43KB)"){:rel="external"}
[Download 'Application form to correct details on a marriage registration' (PDF, 29KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/documents/digitalasset/dg_200736.pdf "Application form to correct details on a marriage registration (PDF, 29KB)"){:rel="external"}
$D

$D
[Download 'Guidance on how to correct details on a death registration' (PDF, 46KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/documents/digitalasset/dg_200733.pdf "Guidance on how to correct details on a death registration (PDF, 46KB)"){:rel="external"}
[Download 'Application form to correct details on a death registration' (PDF, 24KB)](http://www.direct.gov.uk/prod_consum_dg/groups/dg_digitalassets/@dg/@en/documents/digitalasset/dg_200730.pdf "Application form to correct details on a death registration (PDF, 24KB)"){:rel="external"}
$D

Completed forms should be sent to the following address:

$A
GRO Casework Team  
PO Box 476  
Southport
PR8 2WJ
$A

Contact the GRO if you have any questions:

$C
**General Register Office**  
0300 123 1837  
Monday to Friday 8am to 8pm, Saturday 9am to 4pm
$C

##Fees for corrections

If a copying or administration error was made when the certificate was issued, whoever issued the certificate will normally replace it free of charge. 

For other changes you might need to pay a fee if you want a new certificate to be issued.

*[GRO]: General Register Office
